Flood, R., and A. Rose, 1995, Fixing exchange rates A virtual quest for fundamentals, Journal of Monetary Economics 36(1).

Clarida, Richard, 2007, G7 Current Account Imbalances: Sustainability and Adjustment? University of Chicago Press.
Chinn, M.D., 2006, A Primer on Real Effective Exchange Rates: Determinants, Overvaluation, Trade Flows and Competitive Devaluations, Open Economies Review 17(1) (January): 115-143.
Blanchard, Olivier, 2007, Cunent Account Deficits in Rich Countries? MundellFleming Lecture, IMF Staff Papers.
Baxter, M. and A.C. Stockman, 1989, Business Cycles and the Exchange Rate Regime, Journal of Monetary Economics 23.
